attributes.action: let the cultur minster to make pubs bars clubs give cheaper non alcholic drinks to desginated drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i want the govoment to note that when im out drinking i fine some alcholic drinks are cheeper than non and people who im out with who drive say its unfair on them so i prepose that the Designated Driver Scheem shguld make it cheeper for at least the Designated Driver if not all none alcholic drinks
